name: Onix-Systems
tag_list: offshore-it-services, outsourcing, web, php, -net, iphone, seo, asp-net, java, web-development, software-development, it-consulting
overview:
Onix-Systems is the team of highly skilled professionals that provides premium quality, custom and client oriented services in IT consulting, web design and IT development. We have vast of experience in satisfying the most special technical needs of our customers.

Our outstanding feature is satisfying the most sophisticated technical desires of our customers. We are positive that our strong knowledge base, fruitful experience, understanding our clients’ needs is the way to customer satisfaction.

The intersection of team skills and innovative technologies promotes the process of ongoing development. Using modern environment we develop unique web solutions with the cost effective methods.

Service Description Onix-Systems is an outstanding IT consulting and development company successfully operating on the market since 2000. Our strong point is providing high-quality offshore development such as database design and integration, programming, e-commerce solutions and graphic design.

We encourage and promote long-term business bonds with IT consulting companies, application service providers and web development companies. Onix-Systems is an ideal company for you to outsource your web development. Our reliable and professional team will offer the high-class services at very competitive prices.
